content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Hi
assistant> Hi there! That's a fascinating droodle. What does it make you think of? Maybe something from your day could inspire a unique caption!
user> it could be from a perspective looking up from the bottom
assistant> That's an interesting perspective! If you were looking up from below, what kind of structure or scenario do you imagine seeing?
user> Probably a window and outside are skyscrapers reaching toward the sun
That’s a creative vision! I can see the center of the droodle being the sun and the lines representing the towering skyscrapers. How does the window itself fit into the picture you’re creating?

assistant> That’s a creative vision! I can see the center of the droodle being the sun and the lines representing the towering skyscrapers. How does the window itself fit into the picture you’re creating?
user> The window is the outside square

Great! The outer square as the window frames the view perfectly. The lines as skyscrapers give a sense of height and perspective. How does the sun relate to the scene, perhaps casting light or shadows?

assistant> Great! The outer square as the window frames the view perfectly. The lines as skyscrapers give a sense of height and perspective. How does the sun relate to the scene, perhaps casting light or shadows?
user> I am not sure it is just the center
assistant> Now that you can see the droodle, what catches your attention the most? Perhaps there's something unusual or striking about it?
user> The border is unusually bold
assistant> That bold border really frames the whole scene, making everything inside stand out. Do you think it adds a certain feel or emphasis to the image, like a stage or a spotlight?
user> Yes
That bold border really makes everything inside pop, like looking through a focused lens. How do you envision the skyscrapers and sun interacting within this framed scene?

assistant> That bold border really makes everything inside pop, like looking through a focused lens. How do you envision the skyscrapers and sun interacting within this framed scene?
user> The skyscrapers are very tall
assistant> The tall skyscrapers stretching towards that central point make for an imposing sight. How might this scene feel if you were watching it, maybe from a vantage point or within a specific moment?
user> I would feel in awe
assistant> Standing in the center, surrounded by towering skyscrapers reaching for the sun, does indeed inspire awe. How could this feeling be woven into a captivating story or idea for the caption?
user> View up in central park
That’s a perfect fit! The image captures the perspective beautifully, with the bold edges framing the view like towering buildings. Does this perspective convey any specific emotion or story to you?
